ACTION_EVENT Struct Reference
[ACTION+ Module]

import "actionplus.idl";

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Event Structure Defines the current event.

Remarks:
pSender is automatically set to 'this' by IAction::RaiseEvent and IAction::RaiseEventEx

pOriginator is set to 'this' if NULL, otherwise IAction::RaiseEventEx does not change it

nEvent, nSubCode and pPtr are to be supplied with each IAction::RaiseEvent and IAction::RaiseEventEx call

pSubs points to the information provided when the action was subscribed.

Definition at line 140 of file actionplus.idl.
